column3: What is Flutter and what makes it different from other frameworks?
column9: Flutter is Google's UI toolkit for natively compiled apps from a single codebase
column10: using Dart language and widget-based architecture.

column3: How do you create a new Flutter project?
column9: Use "flutter create project_name" in terminal or IDE's Flutter project creation wizard.

column3: What is the main() function in a Flutter app?
column9: main() is the entry point of every Flutter app
column10: where runApp() is called to start the application.

column3: What is a Widget in Flutter?
column9: Widgets are reusable UI components that describe what the app's view should look like.

column3: How do you display text in Flutter?
column9: Use the Text('Your text') widget to display text on screen.

column3: What is the difference between Stateless and Stateful widgets?
column9: Stateless widgets are immutable; Stateful widgets can change state and trigger UI updates.

column3: How do you add an image to your Flutter app?
column9: Use Image.asset('path/to/image.png') for local images or Image.network('url') for web images.

column3: What is the Scaffold widget used for?
column9: Scaffold provides basic Material Design visual layout structure like app bars

column3: How do you create a button in Flutter?
column9: Use ElevatedButton
column11: or IconButton widgets with onPressed callback.

column3: What is the purpose of the pubspec.yaml file?
column9: Manages project dependencies
column12: and metadata for the Flutter application.

column3: How do you add padding around a widget?
column9: Use Padding widget with EdgeInsets or Container widget with padding property.

column3: What is the Column widget used for?
column9: Column arranges its children vertically in a linear direction from top to bottom.

column3: What is the Row widget used for?
column9: Row arranges its children horizontally in a linear direction from left to right.

column3: How do you create a list of items in Flutter?
column9: Use ListView.builder for dynamic lists or ListView with children for static lists.

column3: What is the Container widget used for?
column9: Container is a versatile widget for styling

column3: How do you navigate between screens in Flutter?
column9: Use Navigator.push() to go to new screen and Navigator.pop() to return to previous screen.

column3: What is the AppBar widget used for?
column9: AppBar provides a top app bar with title
column11: and navigation controls in Material Design.

column3: How do you add icons to your Flutter app?
column9: Use Icon widget with Icons.class_name (like Icons.home) for Material icons.

column3: What is the Center widget used for?
column9: Center aligns its child widget both horizontally and vertically in the available space.

column3: How do you create a text input field in Flutter?
column9: Use TextField or TextFormField widgets for text input with various customization options.

column3: What is hot reload in Flutter?
column9: Hot reload instantly updates the running app with code changes without restarting.

column3: How do you change text color in Flutter?
column9: Use style property of Text widget with TextStyle(color: Colors.red).

column3: What is the MaterialApp widget used for?
column9: MaterialApp sets up the fundamental Material Design components and app-wide configuration.

column3: How do you add a background color to a widget?
column9: Use Container with color property or BoxDecoration with color for background colors.

column3: What is the Expanded widget used for?
column9: Expanded widget makes a child of Row or Column expand to fill available space.

column3: How do you create a simple alert dialog in Flutter?
column9: Use showDialog() with AlertDialog widget to display simple alert messages.

column3: What is the SizedBox widget used for?
column9: SizedBox creates a box of fixed dimensions
column10: either for spacing or constraining child size.

column3: How do you add margins around a widget?
column9: Use Container with margin property or Padding widget for margins.

column3: What is the Stack widget used for?
column9: Stack overlays multiple widgets on top of each other

column3: How do you make a widget clickable in Flutter?
column9: Wrap widget with GestureDetector or InkWell for tap/click interactions.

column3: What is the ListTile widget used for?
column9: ListTile provides a fixed-height row with leading/trailing icons and title/subtitle.

column3: How do you change the font size of text in Flutter?
column9: Use TextStyle with fontSize property: Text('Hello'

column3: What is the Divider widget used for?
column9: Divider creates a horizontal line to separate content visually.

column3: How do you create a checkbox in Flutter?
column9: Use Checkbox widget with value and onChanged properties for selection.

column3: What is the CircularProgressIndicator widget used for?
column9: Displays a circular progress indicator for loading or processing states.

column3: How do you create a dropdown menu in Flutter?
column9: Use DropdownButton widget with items and onChanged properties.

column3: What is the SafeArea widget used for?
column9: SafeArea ensures child widgets aren't obscured by device notches or system UI.

column3: How do you add a border to a widget?
column9: Use Container with decoration: BoxDecoration(border: Border.all())

column3: What is the Spacer widget used for?
column9: Spacer creates adjustable empty space that expands to fill available space.

column3: How do you create a radio button in Flutter?
column9: Use Radio widget within RadioGroup for single selection from multiple options.

column3: What is the Card widget used for?
column9: Card creates a Material Design card with rounded corners and elevation shadow.

column3: How do you create a switch/toggle in Flutter?
column9: Use Switch widget with value and onChanged properties for toggle functionality.

column3: What is the Flexible widget used for?
column9: Flexible makes a child of Row/Column flexible with flex factor for space distribution.

column3: How do you create a slider in Flutter?
column9: Use Slider widget with value

column3: What is the RichText widget used for?
column9: RichText displays text with multiple styles using TextSpan children.

column3: How do you add rounded corners to a widget?
column9: Use Container with decoration: BoxDecoration(borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(10))

column3: What is the SingleChildScrollView widget used for?
column9: Wraps a single child widget to make it scrollable when content exceeds screen size.

column3: How do you create a progress bar in Flutter?
column9: Use LinearProgressIndicator widget for horizontal progress indication.

column3: What is the Drawer widget used for?
column9: Drawer provides a sliding panel typically accessed from AppBar for navigation.

column3: How do you create a date picker in Flutter?
column9: Use showDatePicker() function to display Material Design date picker.

column3: What is the Wrap widget used for?
column9: Wrap automatically flows children to next line when horizontal space is insufficient.

column3: How do you create a time picker in Flutter?
column9: Use showTimePicker() function to display Material Design time picker.

column3: What is the AspectRatio widget used for?
column9: AspectRatio sizes its child to specified aspect ratio regardless of available space.

column3: How do you create a snackbar in Flutter?
column9: Use ScaffoldMessenger.of(context).showSnackBar() with SnackBar widget.

column3: What is the Positioned widget used for?
column9: Positioned positions a child of Stack widget at specific coordinates within the stack.

column3: How do you create a bottom navigation bar in Flutter?
column9: Use BottomNavigationBar with items and currentIndex properties in Scaffold.

column3: What is the Align widget used for?
column9: Align positions its child widget according to alignment property within available space.

column3: How do you create a tab bar in Flutter?
column9: Use DefaultTabController with TabBar and TabBarView for tabbed interface.

column3: What is the FittedBox widget used for?
column9: FittedBox scales and positions its child widget to fit according to fit property.

column3: How do you create a tooltip in Flutter?
column9: Wrap widget with Tooltip widget or use tooltip property in IconButton.

column3: What is the Opacity widget used for?
column9: Opacity makes its child widget partially transparent with specified opacity value.

column3: How do you create a floating action button (FAB) in Flutter?
column9: Use FloatingActionButton widget in Scaffold's floatingActionButton property.

column3: What is the GridView widget used for?
column9: GridView displays widgets in a scrollable grid arrangement with configurable columns.

column3: How do you create a simple form in Flutter?
column9: Use Form widget with GlobalKey and FormField widgets for validation.

column3: What is the Visibility widget used for?
column9: Visibility shows or hides its child widget based on visible property.

column3: How do you add a shadow to a widget?
column9: Use Container with decoration: BoxDecoration(boxShadow: [BoxShadow()])

column3: What is the AnimatedContainer widget used for?
column9: AnimatedContainer automatically animates changes to its properties over time.

column3: How do you create a simple animation in Flutter?
column9: Use AnimationController with Tween and AnimatedBuilder for basic animations.

column3: What is the MediaQuery widget used for?
column9: MediaQuery provides information about the current device and app environment.

column3: How do you change app theme colors in Flutter?
column9: Define ThemeData in MaterialApp's theme property for app-wide theming.

column3: What is the Dismissible widget used for?
column9: Dismissible allows swiping to dismiss list items with background actions.

column3: How do you create a stepper widget in Flutter?
column9: Use Stepper widget with steps property for multi-step form navigation.

column3: What is the ClipRRect widget used for?
column9: ClipRRect clips its child widget with rounded rectangle boundary.

column3: How do you create a data table in Flutter?
column9: Use DataTable widget with columns and rows properties for tabular data.

column3: What is the RefreshIndicator widget used for?
column9: RefreshIndicator provides pull-to-refresh functionality for scrollable content.

column3: How do you create a simple chart in Flutter?
column9: Use external packages like charts_flutter or fl_chart for chart creation.

column3: What is the Transform widget used for?
column9: Transform applies affine transformation matrix to its child widget.

column3: How do you play a video in Flutter?
column9: Use video_player package with VideoPlayerController and VideoPlayer widget.

column3: What is the WillPopScope widget used for?
column9: WillPopScope intercepts back button press for custom back navigation behavior.

column3: How do you create a custom font in Flutter?
column9: Add font files to pubspec.yaml under fonts section and reference in TextStyle.

column3: What is the ListWheelScrollView widget used for?
column9: ListWheelScrollView displays items in a wheel that users can scroll through.

column3: How do you create a search bar in Flutter?
column9: Use TextField with onChanged for live search or SearchDelegate for full-screen search.

column3: What is the CupertinoApp widget used for?
column9: CupertinoApp provides iOS-style widgets and theming for Apple platform look.

column3: How do you create a splash screen in Flutter?
column9: Define home screen with timer or use native splash screen configuration.

column3: What is the InteractiveViewer widget used for?
column9: InteractiveViewer allows panning
column11: and scaling of its child widget.

column3: How do you create a barcode scanner in Flutter?
column9: Use packages like barcode_scan or mobile_scanner for barcode scanning functionality.

column3: What is the Hero widget used for?
column9: Hero creates flying animation for shared element between two screens.

column3: How do you create a PDF viewer in Flutter?
column9: Use packages like pdf_flutter or flutter_pdfview for PDF display functionality.

column3: What is the ReorderableListView widget used for?
column9: ReorderableListView allows users to reorder list items via drag and drop.

column3: How do you create a map in Flutter?
column9: Use google_maps_flutter package with GoogleMap widget for map display.

column3: What is the IgnorePointer widget used for?
column9: IgnorePointer prevents its child and subtree from receiving pointer events.

column3: How do you create a calendar in Flutter?
column9: Use packages like table_calendar or syncfusion_flutter_calendar for calendar widgets.

column3: What is the AbsorbPointer widget used for?
column9: AbsorbPointer absorbs pointer events

column3: How do you create a file picker in Flutter?
column9: Use file_picker package for selecting files from device storage.

column3: What is the BackdropFilter widget used for?
column9: BackdropFilter applies image filter to background behind child widget.

column3: How do you create a webview in Flutter?
column9: Use webview_flutter package with WebView widget for displaying web content.

column3: What is the ShaderMask widget used for?
column9: ShaderMask applies shader to child widget
column10: useful for gradient masks and effects.

column3: How do you create a fingerprint/face ID authentication in Flutter?
column9: Use local_auth package for biometric authentication functionality.

column3: What is the AnimatedBuilder widget used for?
column9: AnimatedBuilder rebuilds widget tree when animation value changes for custom animations.

column3: How do you create a notification system in Flutter?
column9: Use firebase_messaging package for push notifications with Firebase.

column3: What is the ClipOval widget used for?
column9: ClipOval clips its child widget with oval (or circular) boundary.

column3: How do you create a chatbot interface in Flutter?
column9: Use ListView for messages
column11: and custom widgets for message bubbles.

column3: What is the FractionallySizedBox widget used for?
column9: FractionallySizedBox sizes its child to fraction of available space (width/height factors).

column3: How do you create a QR code generator in Flutter?
column9: Use qr_flutter package to generate and display QR codes.

column3: What is the PageView widget used for?
column9: PageView creates scrollable pages that users can swipe horizontally.

column3: How do you create a rating system in Flutter?
column9: Use rating_bar package or create custom widget with IconButton for star ratings.

column3: What is the CustomPaint widget used for?
column9: CustomPaint provides canvas for custom drawing using CustomPainter.

column3: How do you create a music player in Flutter?
column9: Use audioplayers package for audio playback with play/pause/seek controls.

column3: What is the NotificationListener widget used for?
column9: NotificationListener listens for notifications bubbling up the widget tree.

column3: How do you create a graph/chart visualization in Flutter?
column9: Use fl_chart package for various chart types like line

column3: What is the LayoutBuilder widget used for?
column9: LayoutBuilder provides constraints of parent widget for building responsive layouts.

column3: How do you create a camera app in Flutter?
column9: Use camera package with CameraController for camera functionality.

column3: What is the SliverAppBar widget used for?
column9: SliverAppBar creates app bar that responds to scroll gestures with special effects.

column3: How do you create a signature pad in Flutter?
column9: Use signature package or CustomPaint with GestureDetector for drawing.

column3: What is the AnimatedOpacity widget used for?
column9: AnimatedOpacity automatically animates opacity changes over specified duration.

column3: How do you create a weather app in Flutter?
column9: Use http package to fetch weather data from API and display with custom UI.

column3: What is the AnimatedCrossFade widget used for?
column9: AnimatedCrossFade cross-fades between two children with animation.

column3: How do you create a todo list app in Flutter?
column9: Use ListView with Checkbox for tasks

column3: What is the TweenAnimationBuilder widget used for?
column9: TweenAnimationBuilder animates between two values over duration with builder function.

column3: How do you create a calculator app in Flutter?
column9: Use GridView for buttons

column3: What is the SliverList widget used for?
column9: SliverList creates scrollable list within CustomScrollView for custom scroll effects.

column3: How do you create a currency converter in Flutter?
column9: Use http package to fetch exchange rates and TextField for input conversion.

column3: What is the AnimatedPadding widget used for?
column9: AnimatedPadding automatically animates padding changes over specified duration.

column3: How do you create a stopwatch/timer app in Flutter?
column9: Use Timer.periodic for updates and display time with Text widget formatting.

column3: What is the AnimatedPositioned widget used for?
column9: AnimatedPositioned automatically animates position changes within Stack.

column3: How do you create a photo gallery in Flutter?
column9: Use GridView.builder with Image widgets for photo grid display.

column3: What is the AnimatedAlign widget used for?
column9: AnimatedAlign automatically animates alignment changes over specified duration.
